verses.text: \w Of|strong="H3068"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. \w To|strong="H3381"\w* \w You|strong="H5973"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w*; \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H6435"\w* \w deaf|strong="H2790"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w Rock|strong="H6697"\w*. \w For|strong="H7121"\w* \w if|strong="H6435"\w* \w You|strong="H5973"\w* \w remain|strong="H2790"\w* \w silent|strong="H2790"\w*, \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w like|strong="H4911"\w* \w those|strong="H4480"\w* \w descending|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* Pit.

\w Do|strong="H6466"\w* \w not|strong="H1696"\w* \w drag|strong="H4900"\w* \w me|strong="H1696"\w* \w away|strong="H5973"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, \w and|strong="H7965"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* \w workers|strong="H6466"\w* \w of|strong="H6466"\w* iniquity, \w who|strong="H7563"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w their|strong="H7563"\w* \w neighbors|strong="H7453"\w* \w while|strong="H5973"\w* malice \w is|strong="H7563"\w* \w in|strong="H1696"\w* \w their|strong="H7563"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3824"\w*.

\w Since|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* show \w no|strong="H3808"\w* regard \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w works|strong="H4639"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w what|strong="H4639"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H4639"\w*, \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w tear|strong="H2040"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w down|strong="H2040"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w rebuild|strong="H1129"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w cry|strong="H6963"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w shield|strong="H4043"\w*; \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* trusts \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w Him|strong="H5826"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w helped|strong="H5826"\w*. \w Therefore|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* rejoices, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H3034"\w* \w thanks|strong="H3034"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Him|strong="H5826"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w song|strong="H7892"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H1931"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w stronghold|strong="H4581"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w*.
